page.title: 06 Public Transport
page.content: There are only two{bus routes}serving the eastern half of the block, run by Hatts Coaches of Foxham for the Wiltshire County Council Public Transport Scheme. It is called the Bremhill Area Service 95. For people living at Kellaways there is a service on Tuesday leaving at 9.32 to Chippenham and returning at 11.45 and again on Friday leaving at 10.02 and returning at 12.30. For West Tytherton (Tytherton Lucas) the Tuesday service is the same but on Friday the bus leaves for Chippenham at 9.23 and returns at 11.50. Hatts Coaches also run the school bus taking children to Maud Heath C.P. School at 8.45 a.m. and returning at 3.05 p.m. Thomas' Coaches take the Secondary children to Chippenham's Hardenhuish School at 8.30 a.m. and return at 4.05 p.m.
